summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for preparation of a possible bond proposal, establishing positions and fixing salary levels, amending the Budget of the Executive Department by reappropriation and transfer of $15,000 in 1980 budget of the Department of Finance General, Account 55197 - Special Project - Bond Issue Planning, CEMS Code 4694, and by a nonreimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the Emergency therefor; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
